overview: As Chief Financial Officer, Sean is responsible for financial strategy and direction for Sugar Inc. Prior to joining Sugar as CFO, Sean spent five years at Symantec and VERITAS Software in M&A, business development, finance, and operating roles. He was most recently Senior Director and General Manager of the NetBackup Realtime product group. Sean was also an early employee of Epinions, Inc., a consumer-review-powered shopping website acquired by eBay, and worked as an investment banker for Goldman Sachs and Alex. Brown & Sons. He received a BA in Computer Science from Dartmouth College and an MBA from Stanford Business School, where he was an Arjay Miller Scholar.
